name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Sales Engineer, I bring a strong background in **cloud security**, **Cybersecurity**, and **SASE**, supported by my expertise in compliance frameworks such as CISSP and CCNP. With 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I have built high-performance solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My technical proficiency includes working with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, in addition to my deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. 

I am adept at delivering impactful presentations and employing value selling techniques to effectively communicate technical solutions to clients. My remarkable ability to lead the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrates AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, along with a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. I ensure the delivery of robust and secure applications that are aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
